name: Portaloop
description:
This is a game I made for Ludum Dare 47 for the theme "Stuck in a loop"

You play a snake-like creature protecting ever-appearing portals from your enemies (don't let their appearance fool you!)  by looping your tail around them and getting them stuck - fortunately, confined spaces stress them so much they explode.
- When an enemy manages to enter the portal, the rest of the enemies heading for that same portal become angry and choose to pursue you instead.
- You get score for forcing non-angry enemies to explode.
- The game ends when your head either hits an enemy or a wall.

Controls: Left/Right/W/S

Tools used:
- Unity
- Gimp
- Bosca Ceoil
- Bfxr
